maqras.text: 44|17|Kare-ra izen ni mo, ware wa firuaun no min o kokoromita. Sonotoki kare-ra ni tōtoi shito (mūsā) ga kite,
44|18|(itta. ) `Arrā no shimo be-tachi (Isuraeru no shison) o, watashi ni kaeshi nasai. Hontōni watashi wa, anata gata no moto ni yattekita seijitsuna shitodesu.
44|19|Arrā ni taishite, kōmandeatte wa narimasen. Hontōni watashi wa meihakuna ken'i o motte, anata gata no tokoro ni yattekita nodesu.
44|20|Anata gataga (watashi o) ishi uchi ni surunara, watashi soshite anata gata no omode mo aru okata ni, sukui o motomemasu.
44|21|Moshi anata gataga, watashi o shinjinainaraba, watashi ni wa kamawanaide kudasai.'
44|22|Sokode, kare wa omoni ino~tsu(te i~tsu)ta. `Korera wa tsumibukai hitobitodesu.'
44|23|(-Nushi no o kotae ga atta. ) `Anata wa yoru no naka ni, waga shimo be to tomoni tabidate. Kanarazu anata gata ni otte ga kakarou.
44|24|Soshite umi wa (watatta nochi) waketa mama ni shite oke. Hontōni kare-ra wa, oborete shimau kotodearou.'
44|25|Kare-ra wa, ikaga ni ōku no en to izumi o nokoshita ka.
44|26|Mata (yutakana) kokumotsu no hata to, kōfukuna sumai o,
44|27|mata kare-ra ga soko de kyōraku shite ita yoi mono o (nokoshita ka. )
44|28|(Kare-ra no nochi wa) kōdeatta. Soshite ware wa,-gai no min ni (sorera o) tsuga seta.
44|29|Kare-ra no tame ni, ten mo ji mo nakazu, kare-ra ni yūyo mo atae rarenakatta.
44|30|Ware wa, Isuraeru no shison o kutsujoku no chōbatsu kara sukui,
44|31|firuaun kara (sukuidashita). Hontōni kare wa, kōman de muhōmonodeatta.
44|32|Ware wa omou tokoro ni yori, kare-ra o sho minzoku no ue ni eranda.
44|33|Soshite meihakuna shiren o fukumu, kazukazu no shirushi o ataeta.
44|34|Sate korera (makka no gūzō shinja) wa (oroka ni mo) iu.
44|35|`Watashi-tachi wa saisho shineba (2-do to) okosa renai.
44|36|Moshi anata gata (no kotoba) ga shinjitsunara, watashi-tachi no sosen o tsuremodoshite mi nasai.'

44|37|Kare-ra (makka no gūzō shinja) wa tobbau no min ka, mata sore izen no mono-tachi yori sugurete iru no ka. Ware wa kare-ra (sho minzoku) o horoboshita nodearu. Hontōni kare-ra wa tsumi o okashita monodeatta.
44|38|Ware wa ten to ji, soshite sonoaida ni aru subete no mono o, tawamure ni tsukutta node wanai.
44|39|Ware wa, tenchi to sonoaida no subete no mono o, tada shinri no tame ni tsukutta. Daga, kare-ra no ōku wa rikai shinai.
44|40|Hontōni (zen'aku no) senbetsu no hi wa, subete no mono ni sadame rareta hidearu.
44|41|Sonohi, tomo wa sono tomo no tame ni nani mo yakudatezu, mata kare-ra wa enjo mo e rarenai.
44|42|Daga arrā no o jihi o hi mutta-sha-tachi wa betsudearu. Hontōni kare wa iryoku narabinaku jihibukaku ara reru.
44|43|Hontōni a~tsu zakkūmu no ki koso wa,
44|44|-zai aru mono no katedearu.
44|45|Sore wa toketa dō no yō ni naizō no naka de futtō shiyou,
44|46|nettō ga tagiri kaeru yō ni.
44|47|(Koe ga shite iwa reyou. ) `Kare o toraeyo, moesakaru honō no tadanaka ni, hikizurikome.
44|48|Sore kara, kare no atama no ue ni futtō suru yu no tsūku o abise yo.
44|49|Anata wa (kore o) ajiwauga ī. Hontōni anata wa,-ryoku no aru sonkina monodeatta.
44|50|Kore koso anata gataga, utagatte ita monodearu.'
44|51|Hontōni,-nushi o osoreta mono wa, antaina tokoro ni iru.
44|52|En to izumi no ma ni,
44|53|kinu ya nishiki o matoi, tagaini mukaiatte,
44|54|kono yō ni ware wa, kagayaita ōkī me no otome-tachi o kare-ra no haigūsha ni surudearou.
44|55|Kare-ra wa soko de heian ni, subete no kajitsu o motome rare,
44|56|saisho no shi no soto ni, sokode (futatabi) shi o ajiwau koto wa naku, moeru honō no seme ku kara shugo sa reyou.
44|57|Anata no nushi kara no tamamono, sore koso wa shifuku no jōjudearo.
44|58|Ware wa kono (kuruān) o, anata no kotoba (Arabia-go) de (oroshi) wakari yasuku shita. Kare-ra wa, rikai shi satosa reru kamo shirenai.
44|59|Dakara shibaraku matte yōsu o mi nasai. Hontōni kare-ra no kata mo yōsu o ukagatte iru nodakara.
45|1|Hā mīmu.
45|2|Kono Keisuke no keiji wa, iryoku narabinaku eimeina, arrā kara (kudasa reta mono)dearu.
45|3|Hontōni ten to ji ni wa, shinja-tachi ni tori shuju no shirushi ga aru.
45|4|Mata anata gata jishin no sōzō, soshite kare ga (chijō ni) 撤Ki chirasa reta ikitoshiikerumono ni wa, shinjin kengona mono ni taishi, shuju no shirushi ga aru.
45|5|Hiru to yoru to no kōtai, mata arrā ga ten kara kudasa reta kate, sore ni yotte shinde iru daichi ga yomigaeru koto, mata kazamuki no henka ni mo, chisei aru mono e no shuju no shirushi ga aru.
45|6|Korera wa, shinri ni yotte ware ga anata ni dokuju suru arrā no shirushidearu. Arrā to sono keiji igai ni, don'na setsuyu o (kare-ra wa) shinjiyou to suru no ka.
45|7|Wazawai naru ka na, subete no tsumibukai uso-tsuki-sha-tachi yo.
45|8|Arrā no keiji ga kare ni dokuju sa reru no o kiite mo,na o gōjō, kōman de, sore ga kikoenai ka no yōdearu. Sorenara itamashī chōbatsu o kare-ra ni tsuge shiraseyo.
45|9|Kare-ra wa, waga keiji no ippashi o rikai suru to, sore o chōshō-teki ni toru, korera no mono ni wa, hazubeki chōbatsu ga aru.

45|10|Kare-ra no yukusaki wa jigoku de, sono okonatta koto wa, kare-ra ni yakudatsu koto wa nani mo naku, mata gādian to shite, arrā igai ni inotta mono mo, yakudatanai. Kare-ra ni wa teitai chōbatsu ga aru.
45|11|Korega (shin no) michibikidearu. Omo no shirushi o shinjinai-sha-tachi ni wa,-ki shiku kurushī chōbatsu ga aru.
